title: WASP2 Sanity Test Dataset - chr21 HG00731
description: Real RNA-seq benchmark data for WASP2 CI sanity testing. Contains chr21 subset of HG00731 sample (~855K reads, ~33K het variants) with expected pipeline outputs for reproducibility validation.
notes: This dataset is used for CI sanity testing of the WASP2 Rust-accelerated pipeline. It validates that allele counting, FASTQ generation, and analysis produce consistent results.
